page.title: 02THE VILLAGE OF HOATH
page.content: Hoath is a small village . It only has 93 homes including 12 flats for old people . In the middle of the village there is a post office which sells sweets,groceries and household items.Also in the middle of the village there is a church which was built in the 14th century.Next to the church there is Hoath Court Farm which has been there over 3 hundred years.They built a village school in 1860 and now it is used as a village hall by people for many activities. There is a pub called the Admiral Rodney which is next door to the church. There is a village school which is still being used now in 1985. On average the school takes in 6 five year olds each year.This is similar to the number of baptisms recorded in Tudor times and shows how little Hoath has grown.
